name: ARCOBALENO - rainbow fused glass knob > Size L [+ other sizes]
description:
Rich array of rainbow colours fused within the thickness of a smooth glass knob. Smooth edges and a stunning gloss surface.

Buy here in Large size (approx 52mm sq.) @ £24.20 each

Also available in other sizes:
Small (approx 35mm sq.) @ £18.50 each
Medium (approx 42mm sq.) @ £20.70 each

For these alternative sizes, or if you want a mixture of S,M or L sizes, click "Contact" and tell us what you need. We'll confirm the details and swiftly prepare a special matching batch for you!

All our knobs are fitted with a discrete brushed stainless steel stem, with euro-standard 25mm fixing screw to suit most cabinets.

At Tikai, we hand-make all our products to order and dispatch within 5-7 days.

Slight variations/bubbles are a feature of these hand-made products.

(approx 50mm sq.)

At Tikai, we hand-make all our products to your order and dispatch within 5 days.

name: TREVI fused glass handle > Size M : 96mm screw centres [+ other sizes]
description:

Medium size @ £16.30 each handle

description:
Deep gold/orange dichroic glass fused within the thickness of a sleek black glass knob. Smooth edges and a stunning gloss surface.

An amazing glass that shimmers and glows like molten lava! Photos can't show enough so for a better impression go to the  "PRODUCT VIDEOS" page --->

Buy here in Medium size (approx 42mm sq.) @ £20.70 each

Also available in other sizes: 
Small (approx 35mm sq.) = £18.50 each 
Large (approx 52mm sq.) = £24.20 each
